sentence.Network_en: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.
sentence.Network_cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

sentence.Network_en: 1998 was an important year for everyone: a time of change.
sentence.Network_cn: 1998年对所有人来说都是重要的一年：那是个变革的时期。

sentence.Network_en: By the time he's twenty he'll know everyone worth knowing in Washington.
sentence.Network_cn: 到20岁时，他就会认识华盛顿所有值得认识的人。

entry.tran: （某个群体中的）每个人，所有人
entry.def: You use everyone or everybody to refer to all the people in a particular group.

example.ex: Everyone in the street was shocked when they heard the news...
example.tran: 听到那条消息，街上所有的人都震惊了。

example.ex: When everyone else goes home around 5 p.m. Lynn is still hard at work...
example.tran: 当其他所有人都在晚上5点左右回家时，林恩仍在努力工作。

entry.def: You use everyone or everybody to refer to all people.

example.ex: Everyone feels like a failure at times...
example.tran: 人们有时会觉得自己是个失败者。

example.ex: Everyone needs some free time for rest and relaxation...
example.tran: 每个人都需要一些休息和放松的自由时间。

auth_sentence.content: Doomed to fail, that's what everyone said.
auth_sentence.res_content: Doomed to fail, that's what everyone said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Doomed to fail, that's what everyone said.

auth_sentence.content: But not everyone has taken on board that message.
auth_sentence.res_content: But not everyone has taken on board that message.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But not everyone has taken on board that message.

auth_sentence.content: Everyone knows that there is more discomfort to come.
auth_sentence.res_content: Everyone knows that there is more discomfort to come.

stems_affixes.word_buile: lone[adj.孤独的, 独立的]+ly表形容词→adj.孤独的,寂寞的
one一+ly表形容词→adj.唯一的, 单独的
lonely孤独的,寂寞的+ness表名词→n.孤独, 寂寞

stems_affixes.value_cn: 一次, 从前, 曾经

Sentence.sentence: But everyone needs some rest to stay alive.
Solar homes produce the most power on the hot sunny afternoons when everyone rushes home to turn up the air conditioner
It requires no equipment, everyone knows how to do it and it carries the lowest risk of injury.
They came up with 10 or 15 names, and that group of stars was compared with everyone else.
It looks like everyone in town came to the mall today
His logic: companies that embrace automation might use fewer workers, but that's still better than firing everyone and moving the work overseas.

means.word_mean: 每人, 人人, 各人,所有人

sentences.en: Everyone knows what they have to do, don't they?
sentences.cn: 每一个人都知道他们必须干什么, 不是吗?

jushi.english: Everyone who had been in the neighborhood of the robbed orchard were questioned.
jushi.chinese: 被抢果园邻近居住的每一个人都被盘问了。
